Package gov.va.isaac.interfaces.gui.views.commonFunctionality

The interfaces in this package represent the APIs that may or MAY NOT exist on the classpath at runtime.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConceptCreationViewI
    ConceptCreationViewI An interface that allows the creation of a ConceptCreationView implementation, which will be a JavaFX component that extends PopupViewI.
    ConceptViewI
    ConceptViewI An interface that requests a window that displays the details of a concept.
    ContentRequestHandlerI
    ContentRequestHandlerI An interface that represents a content request handler.
    InfoModelViewI
    InfoModelViewI An interface that allows the creation of a InfoModelView implementation, which will be a JavaFX component pops up and shows a view of the InfoModel.
    ListBatchViewI
    ListBatchViewI An interface that allows the creation of an ListBatchViewI implementation, which will be a JavaFX component that extends EmbeddableViewI.
    LoincContentRequestHandlerI
    LoincContentRequestHandlerI An interface that represents a USCRS content request handler.
    PopupConceptViewI
    PopupConceptViewI An interface that requests a pop up window that displays the details of a concept.
    PreferencesPluginViewI
    PreferencesPluginViewI An interface that allows the creation of a PreferencesPluginViewI implementation, which will be a POJO component that contains a data model representing a set of UserProfile preference values, the GUI Region required to view and (optionally) modify them, and the ability to load and save them.
    QueryNodeTypeI
    QueryNodeTypeI
    RefexCreationViewI
    RefexCreationViewI An interface that allows the creation of a RefexCreationView implementation, which will be a JavaFX component that extends PopupViewI.
    RefexViewI
    RefsetViewI An interface that allows the creation of a RefexView implementation, which will be a JavaFX component that extends Region that can be embedded into other views, the purpose of which is to display Refex information for a component.
    RefsetSearchViewI
    RefsetSearchViewI
    WorkflowAdvancementViewI
    WorkflowAdvancementViewI An interface that allows the creation of an WorkflowAdvancementViewI implementation, which will be a JavaFX component that extends/implements PopupTaskWithConceptViewI.
    WorkflowHistoryViewI
    WorkflowHistoryViewI An interface that allows the creation of an WorkflowHistoryViewI implementation, which will be a JavaFX component that extends/implements PopupTaskWithConceptViewI.
    WorkflowInitiationViewI
    WorkflowInitiationViewI An interface that allows the creation of an WorkflowInitiationViewI implementation, which will be a JavaFX component that extends/implements PopupViewI.
    WorkflowTaskDetailsViewI
    WorkflowTaskViewI
    WorkflowTaskI
    WorkflowTaskViewI
    WorkflowTaskWithConceptI
    WorkflowTaskWithConceptI An interface that adds concept API for reuse by subtasks - extends WorkflowTaskI.
    XMLViewI
    XMLViewI Extends the IsaacViewI to provide a View which will pop up a new window on top of the parent window when the showView method is called.

Package gov.va.isaac.interfaces.gui.views.commonFunctionality Description

The interfaces in this package represent the APIs that may or MAY NOT exist on the classpath at runtime. It is up to individual packagers of ISAAC to determine which functionality will be included in a bundle. Any code that requests an instance of an implementation of one of these common functionality packages should be prepared to get null - meaning that the function is not available in the bundle.
